name: CrossPix Crossword - Picture Crossword Challenge
description:
Picture Crossword is a delightful new bite sized crossword game, where every clue is a photo!

Some of the clues are straightforward but with others you’ll have to really think creatively to find the connection.

Like 4 Pics 1 Word, the game is easy to learn, easy to get started, but the pics and puzzles will boggle your brain and riddle your reasoning!

If you like quiz games, wordfinders, love to spell, play trivia, you will be a happy camper with Picture Crossword.
